response:
Yes, We accept New Students and Transferee

Enrollment at NDKC is open for incoming freshmen, transferee, returning, and continuing students in both first and second semester within the enrollment schedule. For incoming freshmen and transferees kindly present your admission credentials.

response:
You can pay thru the following:

WALK-IN : 
NDKC Business Office Cashier(open Monday - Friday 8:30 am - 4:30 pm)

BILLS PAYMENT :
ASIA UNITED BANK(AUB) OR ML PERA PADALA

Information required:
Name of School: NOTRE DAME OF KIDAPAWAN COLLEGES
Student Name:
Department: COLLEGE/GRADUATE

BANK FUND TRANSFER to:
ASIA UNITED BANK
Account Name: NOTRE DAME OF KIDAPAWAN COLLEGES, INC OR NDKC
Account No.: 325-01000026-1

GCASH:
Follow instruction from this : https://www.facebook.com/ndkcofficial/photos/pcb.467411381657771/467410674991175

After payment through Gcash or bank transfer, proof of payment must be emailed to: finance@ndkc.edu.ph
Please indicate the following:
Email Subject: Proof of Payment - Student Name
Email body indicates the following:
Name of the student:
Department:
Level:
Payment Scheme: e.g. Installment
Account: e.g. balance from previous AY

You can also directly contact us:
 NDKC Business Office
 Mobile: 0932-795-8915
 Landline:(064) 577-1673 local 136
 Email:finance@ndkc.edu.ph

patterns: what are the requirements for enrollment
what are requirements to enroll for new students
requirements for continue student
requirements for old student
what is requirements for transferee
what is the requirements for graduate school
what are the requirements for masteral
what to do after i paid
what is needed to enroll
what are the admission credentials needed for enrollment
what are the admission credentials for enrollment
what are the admission credentials
response:
Here are the College Admission Requirements:
Incoming Freshmen:
-Form138/Report Card
-PSA Birth Certificate(original)
-Certificate of Good Moral Character
-1pc 2x2 ID picture

For Transferees:
-Certificate of Transfer/Honorable Dismissal
-Transcript of Records
-PSA Birth Certificate(original)
-Certificate of Good Moral Character
-1 pc. 2x2 ID picture

For Incoming Freshmen and Transferees:
Please refer to this link:
https://www.facebook.com/ndkcofficial/photos/pcb.467365404995702/467363524995890
For Continuing Students:
Please refer to this link:
https://www.facebook.com/ndkcofficial/photos/pcb.467372941661615/467371908328385

For Graduate School(new enrollees):
-Entrance Examination
-Two(2) long brown folder
-Transcript of Records(2 copies photocopy)
-Honorable Dismissal/Certificate of Transfer Credentials(original)-for transferees
-Colored Pictures with white background-3 pcs.(2x2)
-PSA Birth Certificate(2 copies photocopy)
-Photocopy of License-for nursing students only
-PSA Marriage Certificate(female married student)
-Reference Report 
-Application of Admission to Graduate Study
-Login to:
https://schoolmanagementsystem.cloud/globemb/ndkc.college/enrollment/apply
www.enroll.nddu.edu.ph/nddu/applicants

response:
To view grades, fees, and class schedules, login to www.ndkc.edu.ph or https://schoolmanagementsystem.cloud/globemb/ndkc.college/student/ and provide the following:
a. Student ID Number
b. Birthdate
c.Password(your surname in small letters)

Note: For any concerns regarding School Management System (SMS) student account (e.g. student Portal Login), email our SMS Technical support team at mis@ndkc.edu.ph

patterns: can i ask if i can get my TOR

can i request my diploma
can i request my diploma in your office
how ca i get my TOR
how to request authenticated diploma for employment requirement
can i get NSO in registrar now
how to get the school record of the person which is undergraduate
how can i get all my records in NDKC
how can i request TOR GOOD MORAL HONORABLE DISMISSAL
how can i GET TOR GOOD MORAL HONORABLE DISMISSAL
response:
The Office of College Registrar is open on weekdays from 8:00 am to 4:30 pm to cater your requests. For more details contact the office through:

Mobile No.: 0923-955-5278
Landline: (064)577-1673 local 118
Email:registrar@ndkc.edu.ph

Note:
a. Processing of requests is seven (7) working days.
b. Authentication is within the day in the presence of the signatory.
c. If a request is through a representative, authorization letter is required.
-Authorization letter is valid only for specific request.
-It should contain identity of the document owner(name, birthdate, period of stay in school or year graduated),the name of the representative and the relationship to the owner of the record, the requested, the number of copies and the purpose of the document sought.
-Sufficient proof of identity must be established both for the owner and the representative(at least two valid identification cards from both).
